author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Puli - Making Video
text:
A making video of Ilayathalapathy Vijay's 'Puli' has released for the fans. The film, directed by Chimbudevan, is a fantasy drama that also features Sridevi, Sudeep, Shruti Haasan and Hansika playing pivotal roles. Produced by Thameeens, the film has music by Devi Sri Prasad. Puli was high on action and adventure. Puli was Sridevi's comeback vehicle for Tamil films. After a hiatus of almost two decades, the actress will be seen in a Tamil film in which she plays the role of a queen.
Check out the making video:
